ID: 30819
Title: 'ALTER TABLE Add column comment' max length is not set. Mysql  max length is 1024
Description:
## Bug Report
If the mode is ```sql SET sql_mode = 'NO_ENGINE_SUBSTITUTION'; ``` then it gives us warning in Mysql
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

### 1. Minimal reproduce step (Required)

<!-- a step by step guide for reproducing the bug. -->
```sql
Drop table If Exists t1;
create table t1 (c1 VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Abcdefghijabcd', 
c2 INTEGER COMMENT 'aBcdefghijabcdefghijabcdefghijabc',
c3 INTEGER COMMENT '01234567890123456789012345678901234567890123', 
c4 INTEGER, c5 INTEGER, c6 INTEGER, c7 INTEGER, 
INDEX i1 (c1) COMMENT 'i1 comment'
,INDEX i2(c2)  ) COMMENT='ABCDEFGHIJabcdefghijabcde';

set sql_mode='TRADITIONAL';
ALTER TABLE t1 ADD COLUMN c12 INTEGER COMMENT '';


```
### 2. What did you expect to see? (Required)
```sql

mysql> create table t1 (c1 VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Abcdefghijabcd', 
    -> c2 INTEGER COMMENT 'aBcdefghijabcdefghijabcdefghijabc',
    -> c3 INTEGER COMMENT '01234567890123456789012345678901234567890123', 
    -> c4 INTEGER, c5 INTEGER, c6 INTEGER, c7 INTEGER, 
    -> INDEX i1 (c1) COMMENT 'i1 comment'
    -> ,INDEX i2(c2)  ) COMMENT='ABCDEFGHIJabcdefghijabcde';
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.02 sec)

mysql> 
mysql> set sql_mode='TRADITIONAL';
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)

mysql> ALTER TABLE t1 ADD COLUMN c12 INTEGER COMMENT '';
ERROR 1629 (HY000): Comment for field 'c12' is too long (max = 1024)

```
### 3. What did you see instead (Required)
```sql

mysql> create table t1 (c1 VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL COMMENT 'Abcdefghijabcd', 
    -> c2 INTEGER COMMENT 'aBcdefghijabcdefghijabcdefghijabc',
    -> c3 INTEGER COMMENT '01234567890123456789012345678901234567890123', 
    -> c4 INTEGER, c5 INTEGER, c6 INTEGER, c7 INTEGER, 
    -> INDEX i1 (c1) COMMENT 'i1 comment'
    -> ,INDEX i2(c2)  ) COMMENT='ABCDEFGHIJabcdefghijabcde';

set sql_mode='TRADITIONAL';
ALTER TABLE t1 ADD COLUMN c12 INTEGER COMMENT ' OK, 0 rows affected (0.13 sec)

mysql> 
mysql> set sql_mode='TRADITIONAL';
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.00 sec)

mysql> ALTER TABLE t1 ADD COLUMN c12 INTEGER COMMENT '';
Query OK, 0 rows affected (0.37 sec)

```
